item.title: R8R Architecture and Technology!
item.description:
[GYGbot][GYGbot.com] and the [GYGbot network][GYGbot.net] are about enabling a truly dynamic work environment.

The [GYGbot GitHub repository][GYGbot on GitHub] includes various workflow scripts, data APIs and other resources that aim to make it more possible for a professional to efficiently network with compatible team members to deliver value to clients.

item.title: R8R Agile Methodology!
item.description:
[GYGbot][GYGbot.com] and the [GYGbot network][GYGbot.net] are about enabling a truly dynamic work environment.

The [GYGbot GitHub repository][GYGbot on GitHub] includes various workflow scripts, data APIs and other resources that aim to make it more possible for a professional to efficiently network with compatible team members to deliver value to clients.

item.title: Welcome to R8R!
item.description:
R8R and the Salebarn.com developer of R8R are about enabling a truly dynamic, reputation-driven market ecosystem.

The R8R GitHub repository includes a very simple, very minimal database management system along with various workflow scripts, data APIs and other resources that aim to make it more possible for professionals and small companies to efficiently network with compatible team members to deliver value to clients.
